archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Develop Product Offering Procedures
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Develop the procedures for the specific fulfillment, assurance and revenue generation processes for a new or enhanced product offering.

properties.value: Develop Product Offering Procedures develops the procedures for the specific fulfillment, assurance and revenue generation processes for a new or enhanced product offering as well as keeping them up to date. Develop policy support and decision support knowledge for these product offering processes and procedures.
